JPSartre12

Since rocketry has been a big hobby of mine for ~10 years now, I have been following a lot of the teams vying for the X-Prize. It looks like Allen and Rutan have the advantage now, but they need to make two flights carrying three people within two weeks to claim the $10Million prize.
 Rutan is an aeronautical genius, so if anyone can do it, it's him.
 Hat's off to the team for making it to space. emoticon_xgood
JPSartre12
